CadenceStorageInfo.description: Storage details for the Flow account.

storageAvailableInMB.description: Storage available based on unlocked FLOW balance.

lockedFLOWforStorage.description: Amount of FLOW locked for storage.

availableBalanceToUse.description: Available FLOW balance that could be used for storage.

CadenceTokenDataWithCurrency.description: Represents a fungible token vault with pricing and currency conversion.

name.description: Token name from metadata (can be null).

symbol.description: Token symbol from metadata (can be null).

description.description: Token description from metadata (can be null).
description.example: The native token of the Flow blockchain.

logos.description: Logo media information (structure based on common return types).

socials.description: A dictionary of social media links (structure based on common return types).

displayBalance.description: Token balance formatted for display (shifted by decimals).

contractAddress.description: The contract address where the token is defined.

contractName.description: The name of the contract defining the token.

storagePath.description: The storage path for the vault.

receiverPath.description: The public receiver path for the vault.

balancePath.description: The public balance path for the vault.

identifier.description: The full type identifier of the vault.

logoURI.description: The logo URI for the token. Prefers the verified list logo, falls back to the first logo in metadata.

isVerified.description: Whether the token is part of the default Flow list.

priceInUSD.description: Price of the token in USD (mainnet only, empty string if unavailable).

balanceInUSD.description: Value of the balance in USD (mainnet only, empty string if unavailable).

priceInFLOW.description: Price of the token in FLOW (mainnet only, empty string if unavailable).

balanceInFLOW.description: Value of the balance in FLOW (mainnet only, empty string if unavailable).

currency.description: The currency code used for converted price/balance for this token.

priceInCurrency.description: Price in the requested currency (empty string if unavailable or conversion failed).

balanceInCurrency.description: Value of the balance in the requested currency (empty string if unavailable or conversion failed).

evmAddress.description: The EVM address associated with this token (if available) empty string if no evm address.

CadenceFTApiResponseWithCurrencyInData.description: Structure of the successful API response.

result.description: Array of token data with currency conversion.

CadenceFTApiResponseWithCurrency.description: Structure of the successful API response.

result.description: Array of token data with currency conversion.

publicKey.description: The public key associated with the account (matches the query parameter)

keyIndex.description: The index of the key in the account

keyId.description: The ID of the key on the account

weight.description: The weight of the key for multi-sig

isRevoked.description: Whether the key has been revoked

publicKey.description: The public key in hex format

limit.description: the number of transactions to return

offset.description: the number of transactions to skip

image.description: the image url of the transaction

additional_message.description: the additional message of the transaction

next.description: whether there is a next page

logoURI.description: the logo url of the NFT collection

contractType.description: Type of the contract ERC721 / ERC1155

logoURI.description: the logo url of the FT

message.description: Optional message, typically used for errors.

chainId.description: The chain ID of the token

address.description: The contract address of the token

decimals.description: The number of decimals for the token

logoURI.description: The URI for the token logo

flowIdentifier.description: The Flow blockchain identifier for the token

website.description: The website URL for the token

chainId.description: The chain ID where the token resides.

address.description: The contract address of the token.

decimals.description: The number of decimals the token uses.

balance.description: The token balance held by the address, adjusted for decimals.

priceInUSD.description: The price of the token in USD.

balanceInUSD.description: The value of the balance in USD.

priceInFLOW.description: The price of the token in FLOW.

balanceInFLOW.description: The value of the balance in FLOW.

currency.description: The currency code used for priceInCurrency and balanceInCurrency.

priceInCurrency.description: The price of the token in the requested currency (if different from USD).

balanceInCurrency.description: The value of the balance in the requested currency (if different from USD).

chainId.description: The chain ID of the blockchain network

address.description: The contract address of the token

decimals.description: The number of decimals for the token

balance.description: The token balance as a string (to handle large numbers)

chainId.description: The chain ID of the token.

address.description: The contract address of the token.

contractName.description: The name of the token contract.

evmAddress.description: The EVM compatible address, if applicable.

name.description: The name of the token (e.g., "Flow Token").

description.description: A brief description of the token.

decimals.description: The number of decimal places the token uses.

logoURI.description: The URI of the token's logo.

tags.description: A list of tags associated with the token.

flowIdentifier.description: The unique Flow identifier for the token.

website.description: The official website URL of the token.

name.description: The name of the token list.

network.description: The network the token list is associated with.

chainId.description: The chain ID the token list is associated with.

totalAmount.description: The total number of tokens in the list.

filterType.description: The type used for filtering the list.

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the list was generated.

logoURI.description: The URI of the list's logo.

isSvg.description: Indicates if the image is an SVG

collectionSquareImage.description: URL to the collection square image

collectionBannerImage.description: URL to the collection banner image

contractType.description: Type of the contract ERC721 / ERC1155

offset.description: Pagination offset for the next set of results

nfts.description: Array of NFTs in the collection

nftCount.description: Total number of NFTs in the response

url.description: URL to the collection square image

mediaType.description: Media type of the square image

ids.description: Array of NFT IDs in the collection

count.description: Total number of NFTs in the collection

offset.description: Pagination offset for the next set of results

nftCount.description: Total number of NFTs in the response

keyId.description: The key index used for signing

get.summary: Get user address metadata

icon.description: The emoji icon of the user

background.description: The background color of the user

get.summary: Get user metadatas

post.description: (Deprecated) Signs a Flow transaction as the bridge fee payer for approved bridge transactions

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The Flow network to use for signing

envelope_message.description: The encoded transaction message to sign

keyId.description: The key index used for signing

429.description: Too Many Requests - surge pricing active

error.example: Many Requests for surge: communicates temporary pressure and supports standard client backoff via Retry-After. Compatible with rate/fee surge semantics.
Service Unavailable for disabled/stopped payer: indicates the service is intentionally unavailable or down; distinct from surge.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The Flow network to use for signing

payload.description: The encoded transaction message to sign

envelope_message.description: The encoded transaction message to sign

429.description: Too Many Requests - surge pricing active

get.summary: Get account transfer history by token types
get.description: Retrieves the transaction history for a specific account address and token type.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The account address to get transfers for

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of transactions to return (max 100)

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: The offset for pagination

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The token identifier to filter transfers by

get.summary: Get account transfer history
get.description: Retrieves the transaction history for a specific account address

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The account address to get transfers for

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of transactions to return (max 100)

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: The offset for pagination

get.summary: Get payer status
get.description: Retrieves the current status of fee payers and surge pricing information

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The Flow network to query

get.summary: Get a list of NFTs from a specific collection under a FLOW address
get.description:
Use this endpoint to get a list of NFTs that the user owns within a specific collection on the Flow network.
Flow Address -> NFT Collection -> NFTs

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Flow address to get NFTs from

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Flow network (mainnet/testnet)

parameters.name: collectionIdentifier
parameters.description: Collection identifier

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of records to skip

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return

get.summary: Get a list of ALL the Cadence NFT collections on the Flow network
get.description:
Use this endpoint to get a list of ALL the Cadence NFT collections on the Flow network.
This list is used to populate the "Collections" section in the wallet where the user can enable/disable collections.
This is needed on the Flow network as Collections need to be enabled on accounts to receive NFTs.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Flow network (mainnet/testnet)

get.summary: Get a list of the NFT collections and the ids of the nfts owned in each by an account on the Flow network
get.description:
Use this endpoint to get a list of the NFT collections and the ids of the nfts owned in each collection by an account on the Flow network.
This is used to populate the NFT collection list in the UI.
Flow Address -> NFT Collections

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The wallet address to get NFT collections for

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The network to query (mainnet or testnet)

get.summary: Get a list of Nfts owned by an account on the Flow network across all collections
get.description:
Use this endpoint if you need to display an agregated list of NFTs owned by an account across all collections
Flow Address -> NFTs

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Flow address to get NFTs from

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of records to skip

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return

get.summary: Get the cadence scripts

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: version of the scripts

get.summary: V3 ERC20 tokens for  EVM address
get.description: Retrieves all ERC20 tokens owned by the specified EVM address

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The EVM address to query

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The network to query (mainnet or testnet)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Pagination offset for fetching next set of results

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page

get.summary: Get a list of NFTs from a specific collection under a EVM address
get.description:
Use this endpoint to get a list of NFTs that the user owns within a specific collection on the EVM network.
EVM Address -> NFT Collection -> NFTs

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The blockchain network (mainnet, testnet, etc.)

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Flow-EVM address to get NFTs from

parameters.name: collectionIdentifier
parameters.description: Collection identifier

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset string of records to skip

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return

get.summary: Get a list of EVM NFT collections and ids of NFTs owned in each collection by an account
get.description:
EVM Address -> NFT Collections
This endpoint returns a list of EVM NFT collections and the ids of the NFTs owned in each collection by an account.
This is used to populate the NFT collection list in the UI

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The blockchain network (mainnet, testnet, etc.)

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The wallet address to fetch collections for

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for the next set of results

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of collections to return

get.summary: Get a list of NFTs owned by an account on the EVM network across all collections
get.description:
EVM Address -> NFTs
This endpoint returns a list of NFTs owned by an account across all collections on the EVM network.
This is used to populate the NFT list in the UI

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The blockchain network (mainnet, testnet, etc.)

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The wallet address to fetch NFTs for

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for the next set of results

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of NFTs to return

get.summary: V3 FT list including automated additions.
get.description: Retrieves a comprehensive list of Fungible Tokens for a specified network and chain type, merging the default list with automatically discovered tokens.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The network to query (e.g., 'mainnet', 'testnet'). Defaults to 'mainnet'.

parameters.name: chain_type
parameters.description: The chain type (e.g., 'flow', 'evm'). Defaults to 'flow'.

200.description: A successful response containing the full FT list.

404.description: Not Found - The specified network or chain type was not found.

405.description: Method Not Allowed - Only GET requests are permitted.

get.summary: Get an NFT collection list for a specific network
get.description: This endpoint is deprecated. Please use the new endpoint at /api/v2/nft/collections/collections

get.summary: V4 Flow tokens for a Flow address (with currency)
get.description: Retrieves a list of fungible tokens owned by a specific Flow address, including balances, metadata, and price information with currency conversion.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The Flow address (e.g., 0xabcdef1234567890) to query for tokens.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The Flow network to query (mainnet or testnet).

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Currency code for price conversion (e.g., USD, EUR). See /api/v4/currencies.

200.description: A list of fungible tokens with balance, storage info, and converted price data.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid address, network parameter, or unsupported currency.

get.summary: Get a list of supported currencies
get.description: Returns an array of supported currency details for the wallet

get.summary: V4 ERC20 tokens for an EVM address
get.description: Retrieves a list of fungible tokens owned by a specific EVM address, including balances and price information.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The EVM address (with or without 0x prefix) to query for tokens.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The network to query (mainnet or testnet).

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: The currency code (e.g., USD, EUR, JPY) to return prices in. See /api/v4/currencies for supported codes.

200.description: A list of fungible tokens with balance and price data.

chainId.description: Chain ID for the network (747 for mainnet, 545 for testnet).

displayBalance.description: User's token balance adjusted for decimals.

currency.description: The currency code used for price conversion.

priceInCurrency.description: Token price in the requested currency.

balanceInCurrency.description: Token balance value in the requested currency.

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid address, or unsupported currency.

post.summary: Lookup EVM token data with price information
post.description: Returns metadata and price information for specified EVM token addresses

addresses.description: Array of EVM token addresses to fetch data for

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The network to query (mainnet or testnet)

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: The currency code (e.g., USD, EUR, JPY) to return prices in. See /api/v4/currencies for supported codes.

400.description: Bad request, invalid addresses or unsupported currency

get.summary: Flow accounts associated with a public key
get.description:
Retrieves all Flow accounts that have the specified public key registered.
This endpoint proxies requests to the Flow Key Indexer service, transforms the data, and adds caching.

parameters.name: publicKey
parameters.description: The public key in hex format (with or without 0x prefix)

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The network to query (mainnet or testnet)

400.description: Bad request, invalid public key format

get.summary: Get token prices
get.description: Returns price data for Flow and EVM tokens, with optional currency conversion

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Currency code to convert prices to (e.g., USD, EUR, JPY)

200.description: A list of token price data

priceInCurrency.description: Price in the requested currency (if not USD)
